verses.verse: He <S%H935>brought<s%> me to the <S%H1964>temple,<s%> and <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H352>posts,<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%> on the one <S%H6311>side,<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%> on the other <S%H6311>side,<s%> which was the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H168>tent.<s%>

The <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> was <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> and the <S%H3802>sides<s%> of the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> were <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> on the one <S%H2568>side,<s%> and five <S%H520>cubits<s%> on the other <S%H4058>side:<s%> and he measured its <S%H753>length,<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth,<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

Then <S%H935>went<s%> he <S%H6441>inward,<s%> and <S%H4058>measured<s%> each <S%H352>post<s%> of the <S%H6607>entrance,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> and the <S%H6607>entrance,<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H6607>entrance,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

He <S%H4058>measured<s%> its <S%H753>length,<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth,<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1964>temple:<s%> and he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6944>me,<s%> This is the most holy <S%H6944>place.<s%>

Then he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H7023>wall<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of every side <S%H6763>room,<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> all <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> on every <S%H5439>side.<s%>

The <S%H6763>side<s%> <S%H6763>rooms<s%> were in <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6763>stories,<s%> one over another, and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> in <S%H6471>order;<s%> and they <S%H935>entered<s%> into the <S%H7023>wall<s%> which belonged to the <S%H1004>house<s%> for the side <S%H6763>rooms<s%> all <S%H5439>around,<s%> that they might have <S%H270>hold<s%> <S%H270>therein,<s%> and not have hold in the <S%H7023>wall<s%> of the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

The side <S%H6763>rooms<s%> were <S%H7337>broader<s%> as they <S%H5437>encompassed<s%> the house <S%H4605>higher<s%> and <S%H4141>higher;<s%> for the encompassing of the <S%H1004>house<s%> went higher and <S%H4605>higher<s%> <S%H4141>around<s%> the <S%H1004>house:<s%> therefore the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> continued <S%H4605>upward;<s%> and so one went <S%H5927>up<s%> from the <S%H8481>lowest<s%> room to the <S%H5945>highest<s%> by the middle <S%H8484>room.<s%>

I <S%H7200>saw<s%> also that the <S%H1004>house<s%> had a <S%H1363>raised<s%> base all <S%H5439>around:<s%> the <S%H4328>foundations<s%> of the side <S%H6763>rooms<s%> were a <S%H4393>full<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> of <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H679>great<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

The <S%H7341>thickness<s%> of the <S%H7023>wall,<s%> which was for the side <S%H6763>rooms,<s%> on the <S%H2351>outside,<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits:<s%> and that which was <S%H3240>left<s%> was the <S%H1004>place<s%> of the side <S%H6763>rooms<s%> that belonged to the <S%H1004>house.<s%>
Between the <S%H3957>rooms<s%> was a <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> on every <S%H5439>side.<s%>

The <S%H6607>doors<s%> of the side <S%H6763>rooms<s%> were toward the place that was <S%H3240>left,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6607>door<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H6607>door<s%> toward the <S%H1864>south:<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> that was <S%H3240>left<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> all <S%H5439>around.<s%>

The <S%H1146>building<s%> that was <S%H6440>before<s%> the separate <S%H1508>place<s%> at the <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H3220>west<s%> was <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad;<s%> and the <S%H7023>wall<s%> of the <S%H1146>building<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>thick<s%> all <S%H5439>around,<s%> and its <S%H753>length<s%> <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

So he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H1004>house,<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long;<s%> and the separate <S%H1508>place,<s%> and the <S%H1140>building,<s%> with its <S%H7023>walls,<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long;<s%>
also the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and of the separate <S%H1508>place<s%> toward the <S%H6921>east,<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

He <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> of the <S%H1146>building<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the separate <S%H1508>place<s%> which was at its <S%H310>back,<s%> and its <S%H862>galleries<s%> on the one side and on the other <S%H3967>side,<s%> one hundred <S%H520>cubits;<s%> and the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H1964>temple,<s%> and the <S%H197>porches<s%> of the <S%H2691>court;<s%>

the <S%H5592>thresholds,<s%> and the <S%H331>closed<s%> <S%H2474>windows,<s%> and the <S%H862>galleries<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> on their three <S%H7969>stories,<s%> over <S%H5048>against<s%> the <S%H5592>threshold,<s%> with <S%H6086>wood<s%> <S%H7824>ceilings<s%> all <S%H5439>around,<s%> and from the <S%H776>ground<s%> up to the <S%H2474>windows,<s%> (now the <S%H2474>windows<s%> were <S%H3680>covered<s%>),

to the space above the <S%H6607>door,<s%> even to the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H2351>outside,<s%> and by all the <S%H7023>wall<s%> all <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H6442>inside<s%> and <S%H2435>outside,<s%> by <S%H4060>measure.<s%>

It was <S%H6213>made<s%> with <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> and palm <S%H8561>trees;<s%> and a palm <S%H8561>tree<s%> was between <S%H3742>cherub<s%> and <S%H3742>cherub,<s%> and every <S%H3742>cherub<s%> had <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6440>faces;<s%>

so that there was the <S%H6440>face<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> toward the palm <S%H8561>tree<s%> on the one <S%H6440>side,<s%> and the face of a young <S%H3715>lion<s%> toward the palm <S%H8561>tree<s%> on the other <S%H6213>side.<s%> thus was it made through all the <S%H1004>house<s%> all <S%H5439>around:<s%>
from the <S%H776>ground<s%> to above the <S%H6607>door<s%> were <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> and palm <S%H8561>trees<s%> <S%H6213>made:<s%> thus was the <S%H7023>wall<s%> of the <S%H1964>temple.<s%>

As for the <S%H1964>temple,<s%> the door <S%H4201>posts<s%> were <S%H7251>squared;<s%> and as for the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of it was as the appearance of the <S%H4758>temple.<s%>

The <S%H4196>altar<s%> was of <S%H6086>wood,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H1364>high,<s%> and its <S%H753>length<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> and its <S%H4740>corners,<s%> and its <S%H753>length,<s%> and its <S%H7023>walls,<s%> were of <S%H6086>wood:<s%> and he <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H7979>me,<s%> This is the table that is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
The <S%H1964>temple<s%> and the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> had <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1817>doors.<s%>

The <S%H1817>doors<s%> had <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1817>leaves<s%> <S%H8147>apiece,<s%> two <S%H4142>turning<s%> <S%H1817>leaves:<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> leaves for the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1817>door,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1817>leaves<s%> for the <S%H312>other.<s%>

There were <S%H6213>made<s%> on <S%H1817>them,<s%> on the doors of the <S%H1964>temple,<s%> <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> and palm <S%H8561>trees,<s%> like as were <S%H6213>made<s%> on the <S%H7023>walls;<s%> and there was a <S%H5646>threshold<s%> of <S%H6086>wood<s%> on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H197>porch<s%> <S%H2351>outside.<s%>

There were <S%H331>closed<s%> <S%H2474>windows<s%> and palm <S%H8561>trees<s%> on the one side and on the other <S%H3802>side,<s%> on the sides of the <S%H197>porch:<s%> thus were the side <S%H6763>rooms<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and the <S%H5646>thresholds.<s%>
